title: FrameFlow
description: An online editor for stitching, trimming, and sequencing video clips directly in the browser using WebCodecs and WebAssembly.

title: SoundScape
subtitle: Immersive 3D audio experience
description: Explore spatial sound design and binaural mixing right in your browser. Built with the Web Audio API and optimized for VR headsets.

title: CineView
subtitle: Streaming redefined
description: High-fidelity streaming platform that adapts bitrate in real time and integrates with decentralized CDN nodes for optimal performance.

title: PhotoTeller

title: BeatGrid
description: Turn your tracks into real-time reactive visualizations powered by WebGL shaders. Customize styles and transitions.

title: ClipForge
subtitle: Collaborative short-form editor
description: Edit short videos collaboratively with live sync and commenting. Perfect for social media creators and remote teams.
